thread.title: Legislators in Albany Hit Impasse on Gun Legislation

author: Mike Vilensky
title: Legislators in Albany Hit Impasse on Gun Legislation
text:
New York state lawmakers hit an impasse over gun laws Wednesday after the Republican majority blocked a move by Democratic legislators to force a vote on new firearms restrictions.
The Democratic Senate conference used a parliamentary procedure called a “hostile amendment” to attach new gun measures to unrelated legislation before the chamber, but failed to meet the 32-vote threshold for passage.
The...
